product_name: Seattle Sports T-Handle Bilge Pump - Special Buy
long_description: Easy to take on all your paddling adventures, the Seattle Sports T-handle Bilge Pump features an easy-grab handle and a super-strong pump shaft for moving water out of your boat quickly. Pumps a hefty 8 gal. per minute. Foam collar keeps pump afloat if accidentally dropped overboard. Special buy.
short_description: Easy to take on all your paddling adventures, the Seattle Sports T-handle Bilge Pump features an easy-grab handle and a super-strong pump shaft for moving water out of your boat quickly.
